sql-select.name: GetListOfGroups
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[GroupName] AS [NodeUName] ,t.[DistinguishedGroupName] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,t.[DistinguishedGroupName] AS [DistinguishedGroupName] FROM [hist].[h_ldap_Groups] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[isActive] = 1 AND t.[GroupName] IS NOT NULL AND t.[DistinguishedGroupName] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.[GroupName] ASC ;
